# Modern Responsive Website Project

This project is a modern, responsive website built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript featuring:
- Clean, modern design with animations
- Responsive layout for all devices
- Interactive navigation and components
- Optimized performance and accessibility

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file with semantic structure
- `css/style.css` - Modern CSS with flexbox/grid layout
- `js/script.js` - Interactive JavaScript functionality
- `images/` - Image assets (to be added as needed)

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Implement mobile-first responsive design
- Follow modern CSS practices (flexbox, grid, CSS custom properties)
- Add smooth animations and transitions
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Optimize for performance and accessibility
